awd_titl_txt: Photoprocesses and Chemical Kinetics in the Excimer         Molecules
awd_abstract_narration: The experimental program will provide fundamental chemical and                  optical data concerning atomic and excimer species, which are                   difficult to access experimentally.  In particular, it will                     consider Krypton and Xenon compounds and acquire new knowledge on               their strongly bound electronically-excited states, on the photo-               absorption and photo-ionization of their highly excited states,                 and on the process of photoassociation in general.                                                                                                              The goal of these studies is the improvement in the performance                 of rare gas containing devices (e.g. lasers and lamps) and                      processes (semi-conductor growth and etching) through a detailed                understanding of their interaction with background species.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

pgm_ref.pgm_ref_txt: REU SUPP-Res Exp for Ugrd Supp
